Uses of Class
org.eclipse.jface.resource.DeviceResourceDescriptor

  • Packages that use DeviceResourceDescriptor 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.jface.resource
    Provides support for managing resources such as SWT fonts and images.
    org.eclipse.jface.viewers
    Provides a framework for viewers, which are model-based content adapters for SWT widgets.

    • Uses of DeviceResourceDescriptor in org.eclipse.jface.resource

      Subclasses of DeviceResourceDescriptor in org.eclipse.jface.resource 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ColorDescriptor
      Lightweight descriptor for an SWT color.
      class  CompositeImageDescriptor
      Abstract base class for image descriptors that synthesize an image from other images in order to simulate the effect of custom drawing.
      class  FontDescriptor
      Lightweight descriptor for a font.
      class  ImageDescriptor
      An image descriptor is an object that knows how to create an SWT image.
      Methods in org.eclipse.jface.resource with parameters of type DeviceResourceDescriptor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected Object DeviceResourceManager.allocate​(DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)  
      protected Object LocalResourceManager.allocate​(DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)  
      Object LazyResourceManager.create​(DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)  
      abstract Object ResourceManager.create​(DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)
      Returns the resource described by the given descriptor.
      protected void DeviceResourceManager.deallocate​(Object resource, DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)  
      protected void LocalResourceManager.deallocate​(Object resource, DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)  
      void LazyResourceManager.destroy​(DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)  
      abstract void ResourceManager.destroy​(DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)
      Deallocates a resource previously allocated by ResourceManager.create(DeviceResourceDescriptor).
      Object LazyResourceManager.find​(DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)  
      abstract Object ResourceManager.find​(DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)
      Returns a previously allocated resource associated with the given descriptor, or null if none exists yet.
      Object ResourceManager.get​(DeviceResourceDescriptor descriptor)
      Returns a previously-allocated resource or allocates a new one if none exists yet.
      Constructors in org.eclipse.jface.resource with parameters of type DeviceResourceDescriptor 
      Constructor Description
      DeviceResourceException​(DeviceResourceDescriptor missingResource)
      Creates a DeviceResourceException indicating an error attempting to create a resource
      DeviceResourceException​(DeviceResourceDescriptor missingResource, Throwable cause)
      Creates a DeviceResourceException indicating an error attempting to create a resource and an embedded low-level exception describing the cause

    • Uses of DeviceResourceDescriptor in org.eclipse.jface.viewers

      Subclasses of DeviceResourceDescriptor in org.eclipse.jface.viewers 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DecorationOverlayIcon
      A DecorationOverlayIcon is an image descriptor that can be used to overlay decoration images on to the 4 corner quadrants of a base image.
